revised_title: A Description of the Stone Quarry Near Maestrich: A Strategic Retreat
tldr: The author describes a large and impressive stone quarry near Maestrich, which serves as a strategic retreat for the local people during times of conflict. The quarry features numerous square pillars and level walks, making it an ideal shelter for people, their livestock, and belongings. The author also notes the cleanliness of the quarry and the presence of small pools of water, possibly for the needs of the inhabitants.
